name: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
desc: Constants that identify playback suspension reasons.

items.name: static let audioSessionInterrupted: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
items.desc: The system interrupts a participant’s audio session.

items.name: static let coordinatedPlaybackNotPossible: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
items.desc: It’s not possible for a participant to start or resume coordinated playback.

items.name: static let playingInterstitial: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
items.desc: A participant is playing content other than the primary content.

items.name: static let stallRecovery: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
items.desc: The player object is buffering media data after a stall.

items.name: static let userActionRequired: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
items.desc: A playback object requires user intervention to resume playback.

items.name: static let userIsChangingCurrentTime: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
items.desc: A participant is actively changing the current time.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a suspension with a string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a suspension with a raw string value.
